title: Team recruiting Plat 3 plus serious people only.
body: We are currently looking for players who have the drive to climb and improve as a team to try to get into the challenger serious. We are in need of a Mid, Support, and jungle. You can add me in game at eskt Nehemiah or Bladeknight(the adc)

replies.body:
Role: support

Rank: diamond 5
Team experience: a little, some tournies
Champion Pool: leo, janna, thresh, blitz
Time Zone: pst
Times you can play: alot
Anything I should know: add me in game :)
main mid plat 1  add me evilchubo
plat 3 jungle main interested, i added you on my smurf, will add you on main tonight. Helping a friend out
